backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining task, user, and metadata types, access control, storage maps, and admin-only APIs for managing assignee/captain pairs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file and component.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark theme tokens and foundational styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document that loads the React application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring theme, error boundary, bootstrap, and tabbed navigation for Dashboard, Tasks, and Admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen prompting unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity.
Admin-only task creation dialog with form state, validation, directory integration, and submission logic for all task fields.
frontend/src/components/AppBootstrap.tsx: Initializes the authenticated app flow, handling identity, actor setup, profile/admin queries, and showing loading or error screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/AppLoadErrorScre: Displays a user-friendly error screen with reload and optional retry actions when the app fails to load.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDetailsT: Provides a detailed view and edit/delete controls for a specific assignee–captain pair.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDirector: Manages the full assignee–captain directory with add, edit, delete, bulk upload, and tabbed detail views.
frontend/src/components/BulkUploadSectio: Handles CSV/Excel upload and parsing to bulk-create tasks with validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/CategoryManageme: Manages creation and listing of task categories, subcategories, statuses, and payment statuses.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple site footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, user avatar menu, and logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and submit their name and email to create a profile.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Top-level error boundary that logs runtime errors and shows a fallback screen with reload option.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailDialog: Dialog displaying a task list and multi-tab detailed views with edit support for each task.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailsTab.t: Shows detailed information for a single task with editing available for admins.
frontend/src/components/TaskFormDialog.t: Form dialog for creating or editing tasks, handling categories, statuses, dates, and billing fields.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login flow, and loading from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, tasks, and filtering data through an actor API with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Wraps useActor with timeout, retry trigger, and error handling to ensure reliable actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useTaskDetailTabs.ts: Manages UI state for task detail tabs, including opening, closing, updating, and tracking the active tab.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with tabs for bulk upload, settings, and assignee management.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays task metrics with charts and enables filtering tasks by category, status, and payment status, showing results in a detail dialog.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Lists and filters tasks with search, CRUD actions, and task detail tabs for admins and users.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates a CSV template and parses assignee/captain CSV data with validation and simple quoted-value handling.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats bigint or number values into US currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics.ts: Provides redacted diagnostic logging for init steps and runtime errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the task assignment app.
